description: '''Change''' is an [[Italian-American]] [[post-disco]] group formed in [[Bologna]], Italy, in 1979 by businessman and executive producer [[Jacques Fred Petrus]] (1948â€“1987) and [[Mauro Malavasi]] (born 1957). They were heavily influenced by the disco band [[Chic (band)|Chic]]. The current incarnation of the group formed in 2018.
